text: Mahaica-Berbice (Region 5) is a region in the northeast of Guyana. The regional capital is Fort Wellington. The region has an area of 4,190 kmÂ². As of the 2012 census, 49,723 people lived there. It borders the Atlantic Ocean to the north, the region of East Berbice-Corentyne to the east, the region of Upper Demerara-Berbice to the south and the region of Demerara-Mahaica to the west. Category:Regions of Guyana
title: Mahaica-Berbice
